channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: Quick, Check It Out Before It's Too Late! Azure Cost Optimization At It's Finest!
item.description:
Good evening or morning to our readers! Brandon here to give you a last second heads up (sorry) on some great references for optimizing your costs in Azure. As many of our readers know, I have a particular affinity for cost savings for our customers, so I wanted to get this out quickly! Act fast!
2/22/2024:
Check out this livestream event for optimizing your Azure costs with Azure savings plans and reservations, presented by Obinna Nwokolo (Principal Technical Program Manager) and Priyanshi Mittal (Senior Product Manager):https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/reactor/events/21719/
Add...
